text: John, Joe, Sarah are in the park playing football and enjoying the sunny weather. They stop to have some lunch. John has 3 apples in his lunchbox. Joe has 2 apples in his lunchbox. Joe is feeling generous and gives 2 apples to John. Sarah also has 9 apples in her lunchbox. John is full and gives 4 apples to Sarah. How many apples does John now have?
John has 5 apples and his friend gave him 3 more. How many apples does John have now?
A library currently has 10 books. The librarian orders 20 more books. How many books does the library have?
There are 25 birds that are currently sitting on a tree. It starts to rain and 10 of them fly away. How many birds are there left on the tree?
John has £30 in his wallet. He is hungry and buys food from the restaurant for £10. How much money does he have in his wallet?
